parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seatback reclining mechanism can cause the seatback to collapse or recline unexpectedly, leading to loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: The seatback collapses or reclines unexpectedly
the seatback is stuck in a reclined position
the seatback bolts break
the seatback falls backward
the driver loses control of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire tread separation can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially fatal consequences, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: Vibrations while driving
tire noise
sudden loss of tire pressure
tire blowout
tread flapping against the inner fender well
uneven tire wear
bulges on the tire sidewall.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to disclose recall information can lead to consumers being unaware of potential safety risks and not taking necessary actions to address them, which can result in accidents and injuries.
symptoms: Consumers being told that their tires are not part of any recall
only to later discover that they are
and experiencing difficulties in getting a response from the manufacturer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inadequate manufacturer response can lead to consumers being left without a solution to their safety concerns, which can result in accidents and injuries.
symptoms: Manufacturers refusing to provide adjustments or allowances for tire replacement
not responding to consumer inquiries
and not taking adequate action to address safety concerns.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause extended stopping distances, loss of control, and accidents, which can lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The ABS light comes on
the brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal goes to the floor
the vehicle experiences extended stopping distance
the brakes make a metal noise
the rear brakes fail to engage
and the front brakes lock up during wet weather.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake master cylinder can cause the brake pedal to feel soft or spongy, leading to extended stopping distances and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal goes to the floor
and the brake fluid level is low.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake hydraulic system can cause the brake pedal to feel soft or spongy, leading to extended stopping distances and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal goes to the floor
and the brake fluid level is low.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the differential can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents, and may also result in costly repairs.
symptoms: The differential fails
causing vibration or shuddering
especially when accelerating.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents, and may also result in costly repairs or even fires.
symptoms: The transmission catches on fire
transmission fluid leaks
the transmission fails
the driveshaft clinks continually
the vehicle shudders or vibrates
especially when accelerating.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the overdrive transmission can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents, and may also result in costly repairs.
symptoms: The transmission fails
the vehicle shudders or vibrates
especially when accelerating
the transmission does not engage properly
the overdrive feature does not function correctly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the retractable seatbelts can lead to passengers being unbelted, increasing the risk of injury or fatality in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The seatbelts twist and get jammed in the retracting part
the seatbelts lock up and cannot be used
the seatbelts do not tighten properly
the seatbelts loosen up while the vehicle is in motion
the buckle does not fasten.
